General.Name: Huada Automotive Tech Corp Ltd
General.Description: Huada Automotive Technology Corp.,Ltd produces and sells car parts and components in China. The company was founded in 1990 and is based in Jingjiang, China.  Huada Automobile Technology Co., Ltd. manufactures and markets car assembly parts. It offers metal control parts, stamping parts, insulation boards, welding assemblies, and other tooling manufacturing products. The company was founded in 1990 and is based in Jingjiang, China. It has branches in Guangzhou, Changchun, Wuhan, Haining, Yancheng, Chengdu, Huizhou, Qingdao, Tianjin, and Xiaoshan, China.
General.Address: No. 68, Jiangping Road East, Jingjiang, China, 214500
